title: Stream / Review: The 1975 – Sex EP
content:
Having now undergone several name changes, it appears that things are finally falling into place for Manchester outfit The 1975.

Standout track Sex forms the backbone of their new EP of the same title, a collection of future indie anthems destined to be blasted out to thousands of adoring fans at festivals across the world. The aforementioned Sex and You are the highlights of the release, whilst Intro/Set 3 and Undo are more reserved affairs, not as instantaneously catchy but sure to prove live favourites. Check out the full EP below, and pre-order it from iTunes.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
